title: AI-Integrated Full Stack Developer Roadmap for AI Specialists

nodes.title: Modern JavaScript (ES6+)
nodes.description: Transition from Python/C++ logic to asynchronous JavaScript.
nodes.specific_focus: Focus on high-order functions (map, filter, reduce) and asynchronous patterns. Skip old 'var' syntax and complex DOM manipulation libraries like jQuery.

nodes.title: Responsive UI with Tailwind CSS
nodes.description: Rapidly build modern UIs without writing custom CSS files.
nodes.specific_focus: Focus on Flexbox/Grid and standard spacing. Skip deep CSS animations and legacy techniques like Floats or Bootstrap components.

phases.title: Phase 1: Modern Frontend Foundations
phases.description: Bridge the gap from scripting/ML to user interface development using industry-standard JavaScript and CSS techniques.

nodes.title: React.js & Hooks
nodes.description: Master the world's most popular frontend library.
nodes.specific_focus: Focus on functional components and modern Hooks. Skip Class-based components and Redux (use Context API or Zustand instead).

nodes.title: Next.js (App Router)

resources.title: Web Dev Simplified - Next.js Crash Course

nodes.description: The framework of choice for Full Stack applications.
nodes.specific_focus: Focus on the App Router and Server Actions for interacting with Python backends. Skip the 'Pages' directory architecture.

phases.title: Phase 2: Modern Frontend Frameworks
phases.description: Learn React.js to build dynamic, component-based interfaces for AI agents and data visualization.

nodes.title: FastAPI & Pydantic
nodes.description: High-performance Python backends designed for AI integration.
nodes.specific_focus: Focus on asynchronous endpoints and automatic Swagger documentation. Skip Flask or Django if you need speed and AI compatibility.

nodes.title: PostgreSQL & Prisma/SQLAlchemy
nodes.specific_focus: Focus on many-to-many relationships and indexing for performance. Skip legacy DBs like Oracle or complex PL/pgSQL procedures.

phases.title: Phase 3: Pythonic Backend & Databases
phases.description: Utilize existing Python skills to build robust APIs and manage data.

nodes.title: Vector Databases & LangChain Web Integration
nodes.description: Connecting AI Agents to a web interface.
nodes.specific_focus: Focus on streaming LLM responses to the frontend (Socket.io or Server-Sent Events). Skip building models from scratch—focus on integration.

nodes.title: Deployment & Docker
nodes.description: Ship your Full Stack AI application to the world.
nodes.specific_focus: Focus on containerizing the backend and using Vercel for the frontend. Skip complex Kubernetes setups for now.

phases.title: Phase 4: AI Mastery & Deployment
phases.description: The final stage: connecting LLM logic to the web and deploying to production.

description: A streamlined path for an experienced Python/AI professional to transition into Full Stack development, leveraging existing Python expertise and integrating AI Agent/LLM capabilities into web architectures.
